title: My brand new pixel 3 doesn't turn on out of the box
content:
I bought a new pixel 3 XL and after opening the box immediately I tried to turn it on by pressing and holding the power button for 30 seconds but the screen stayed black with no indication that it turned on, and even no blinking red light is show to indicate dead battery.

I followed all the steps provided by Google to debug the issue but nothing work.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
